categories.name: Launchpad
categories.description: Discover new crypto projects and early-stage token sales with launchpads.

categories.name: Bridge & Swap
categories.description: Seamlessly connect different blockchain worlds with these solutions. Transfer your assets and enjoy true interoperability when you swap your tokens.

categories.name: Dashboard
categories.description: Track any activities that happen on the network live, be it governance proposals, assets movemenets or your portfolio.

categories.name: Analytics
categories.description: Gain a deep understanding of your decentralized ecosystem, track trends, and make informed decisions to elevate your web3 experience with these analytic tools!

categories.name: Governance & DAOs
categories.description: Participate in Evmos governance or create your own DAO with these dApps! Track proposals, voting and discussions and always stay up to date!

categories.name: Wallets
categories.description: With these wallets you can generate and store your private keys and manage, send, and receive your assets on Evmos blockchain.

categories.name: Block Explorers
categories.description: With block explorers you can    search for real-time and historical information about Evmos, including block data, transactions, addresses, and more.

categories.name: Oracles
categories.description: Oracles are services that feed smart contracts with real-world information, enabling them to interact with and respond to off-chain events and conditions.

categories.name: On-Ramps
categories.description: Step into the web3 world effortlessly with just a couple of mouse clicks. Effortlessly transition from traditional currencies to digital assets, and enjoy a hassle-free journey into the world of DeFi.

categories.name: Indexer
categories.description: Quickly obtain and organize your blockchain data! Indexers enhance the accessibility ofdata by creating efficient structures for quick and reliable retrieval of information.

categories.name: NFTs
categories.description: Explore NFT Marketplaces on Evmos and always have your digital collections in view at all times.

categories.name: Services
categories.description: Discover more infrastructure tools that facilitate your Evmos experience! Find RPC node providers, access management tools or even tax reporting software!

categories.name: Bridges
categories.description: Bridges are necessary protocols that enable the seamless transfer of assets between different blockchain networks, promoting interoperability.

categories.name: DeFi
categories.description: DeFi apps provide open and permissionless access to a range of traditional financial services, such as lending, borrowing, trading, and yield farming,  without the need for intermediaries like banks.

categories.name: Staking
categories.description: With staking apps you can easily manage your delegations, rewards and receive liquid staked tokens - all while contributing to the network’s security.

categories.name: Centralized Exchanges
categories.description: Centralized exchanges are your go-to marketplace for buying and selling your crypto treasures off-chain. New to crypto world and don’t have any accounts? Start here!

dApps.name: DexPad
dApps.description: DexPad allows anyone to mint, airdrop, launch and lock their tokens seamlessly without any coding required!

dApps.name: Squid
dApps.description:
Squid is a cross-chain liquidity router that allows you to swap your assets between different blockchains and access applications across chains.

In the app, connect your wallet then simply select the origin chain and token as well as the destination chain and token, enter the receiver address and submit the transaction! Now your funds are automatically converted and transferred with just one transaction.
dApps.howTo: In the app, connect your wallet then simply select the origin chain and token as well as the destination chain and token, enter the receiver address and submit the transaction! Now your funds are automatically converted and transferred with just one transaction.

dApps.name: Layerswap
dApps.description:
Layerswap is the only bridge that enables direct and instant transfers from CEXes to blockchains.

Use it like any decentralized exchange (DEX), with the key distinction being the option to select a centralized exchange, like Coinbase or Kraken, or even use your debit/credit card, from the list of origins.
dApps.howTo: Use it like any decentralized exchange (DEX), with the key distinction being the option to select a centralized exchange, like Coinbase or Kraken, or even use your debit/credit card, from the list of origins.

dApps.name: ibc.fun
dApps.description: Skip Protocol provides the most efficient, affordable way to securely swap IBC tokens at the best price.

dApps.name: TFM
dApps.description: TFM is a protocol that offers aggregated solutions for DeFi and NFT including professional trading of tokens and NFTs, and data analytics.

dApps.name: Cypher Wallet
dApps.description:
Cypher Wallet is an all-in-one noncustodial cryptocurrency wallet, which lets you buy, sell, manage, bridge, or stake crypto assets across 12+ blockchains.

Download Cypher extension for  your  browser or an app for your mobile and start using it - generate private and public key, send and receive funds, stake assets, sell or even send your funds to a different chain.
dApps.howTo: Download Cypher extension for  your  browser or an app for your mobile and start using it - generate private and public key, send and receive funds, stake assets, sell or even send your funds to a different chain.

dApps.name: CoinTool
dApps.description: CoinTool is a platform where users can create tokens without coding, transfer tokens from multiple addresses in batches and much more!

dApps.name: Evmos.me
dApps.description: Evmos.me  is a dashboard for Evmos ecosystem which includes tools for voting, staking and densing transactions.

dApps.name: DeBank
dApps.description: DeBank is a dashboard for tracking your DeFi portfolio, with data and analytics for decentralized lending protocols, stablecoins, margin trading platforms and DEXes.

dApps.name: Zapper
dApps.description: Zapper is a DeFi dashboard for monitoring your portfolio, including assets, debts, liquidity pools, staking, claimable rewards, and yield farming activities–with no personal data involved.
dApps.howTo: Connect your wallet, and swap, bridge or browse your assets!

dApps.name: Evmos Portfolio
dApps.oneLiner: Manage your portfolio in one place on Evmos.

dApps.name: Defi Llama
dApps.description: Defi Llama is an open and transparent multi-chain TVL stats dashboard, where data connectors contributed and maintained by a community.
dApps.howTo: Set the chain parameter to “Evmos” and see what is happening on  Evmos  network!

dApps.name: Dex Screener
dApps.description: DEX Screener is a platform that allows traders and investors to track and analyze real-time data from multiple decentralized exchanges and chains.

dApps.name: Kyve
dApps.description: KYVE Network provides fast and easy tooling for data validation, immutability, and retrieval, ensuring trustless data without risks and roadblocks.

dApps.name: Map of Zones
dApps.description: Map of Zones is an interactive explorer of Cosmos Ecosystem. Stay updated!

dApps.name: Snapshot
dApps.description: Snapshot is a voting platform that allows DAOs, DeFi protocols, or NFT communities to vote easily and without gas fees.

dApps.name: Commonwealth
dApps.description: Commonwealth is an all-in-one platform for on-chain communities to discuss, vote, and fund projects together. Never miss an on-chain event, proposal, or important discussion again.
dApps.howTo: Visit the  discussions pannel  to have an overview of ongoing conversations. To vote and see the current proposals on chain, go to the  Governance tab.

dApps.name: NEOKingdom DAO
dApps.description: NEOKingdom DAO provides a combined legal and technical framework for creation of EVM-based, legally compliant DAOs.

dApps.name: Evmos Governance
dApps.description: Decide on the future of Evmos - participate in the community with your Evmos.

dApps.name: FoxWallet
dApps.description: A user-friendly Web3.0 entrance built for multi-chain ecosystems.

dApps.name: Keplr
dApps.description: Keplr is the most used wallet in the Cosmos Ecosystem that  only supports Cosmos transactions.

dApps.name: Trust Wallet
dApps.description: The most trusted & secure crypto wallet. Buy, store, collect NFTs, exchange & earn crypto.

dApps.name: Mathwallet
dApps.description: Multichain Crypto Wallet for 3 million users, 100+ blockchains

dApps.name: Rabby Wallet
dApps.description: The game-changing wallet for Ethereum and all EVM chains

dApps.name: Metamask
dApps.description: Metamask is the leading self-custodial wallet for EVM-based chains. MetaMask also lets you create and manage their own identities private keys, local client wallet and hardware wallets.
dApps.howTo: Download the Metamask  browser extension  and securely manage your EVM assets!

dApps.name: Safe
dApps.description: Safe provides multisig smart contracts for Evmos chain as well as Account Abstraction contract and other tools that enhance Evmos ecosystem.

dApps.name: Escan
dApps.description: Escan is a block explorer for Evmos that allows you to explore and search transactions, addresses, events and other activities.

dApps.name: Mintscan
dApps.description: Mintscan is a block explorer for Cosmos chains that will soon support EVM transactions.

dApps.name: BigDipper
dApps.description: Big Dipper is an open-source block explorer and token management tool serving over 25 proof-of-stake blockchains.

dApps.name: UMA
dApps.description: UMA is an optimistic oracle and dispute arbitration system that securely allows for arbitrary types of data to be brought on-chain.

dApps.name: Pyth
dApps.description: Pyth Network is an oracle that publishes financial market data to multiple blockchains.

dApps.name: RedStone
dApps.description: RedStone is a highly-customizable oracle that offers data related to more than 1000 assets including crypto tokens, stocks, currencies and commodities.

dApps.name: Flux
dApps.description: Flux is a cross-chain oracle, which provides smart contracts with economically secure data.

dApps.name: Transak
dApps.description: Transak is a developer integration toolkit that enables you as an app developer to onboard your users to buy/sell crypto in any blockchain app, website or web plugin.
dApps.howTo: To use the app, you will need to complete the KYC process. After the verification is complete, you are free to buy or sell your cryptocurrency easily by choosing the desired fiat currency and any payment method, such as your bank card.

dApps.name: c14
dApps.description: c14 offers you a seamless fiat-to-crypto payment flow for any web3 projects, making user onboarding even smoother.
dApps.howTo: Visit the homepage, select your preferred fiat currency for payment, and choose the cryptocurrency you wish to receive. Next, complete the process by verifying your phone number and making the payment using your regular bank card. It's that simple!

dApps.name: Numia
dApps.description: Numia is an on-chain Data Indexer and RPC provider that gives you the infrastructure to build apps fast and easy.

dApps.name: Covalent
dApps.description: Covalent is a software that aggregates data from several of the leading blockchain platforms, including Evmos, and allows access to these data points for a variety of use cases.

dApps.name: Evmos Domains
dApps.description: Evmos Domains is a platform that lets you register your own human-readable .evmos domain names that link to addresses on the Evmos blockchain hosted on IPFS.

dApps.name: Orbit Market
dApps.description: Orbit Market is the largest NFT Marketplace in Evmos ecosystem.

dApps.name: Lava Network
dApps.description: Lava is a decentralized protocol and network, which ensures trustless interactions between providers and consumers of blockchain APIs with high throughput and scalability across multiple RPC services.

dApps.name: POKT
dApps.description: Instead of deploying to a single service provider and paying absurd fees for random outages and leaked data, tap into Pocket’s trustless API protocol and route your requests to 1000’s of independent full nodes.

dApps.name: Anchorage
dApps.description: Anchorage offers an unparalleled combination of secure custody, regulatory compliance, product breadth, and client service.

dApps.name: Add3
dApps.description: Add3 is a no-code Web3 platform for creating and managing token products.

dApps.name: Fireblocks
dApps.description: Fireblocks app and APIs are trusted by thousands of crypto businesses for secure custody, treasury management, DeFi access, token operations, and overall digital asset management.
dApps.howTo: Request a demo  directly from Fireblocks or watch this  video tutorial

dApps.name: Lit Protocol
dApps.description: Lit is a distributed key management platform for encryption, signing, and computation that can be used in place of centralized key custodians.

dApps.name: StakeTax
dApps.description: StakeTax is a pioneering software application designed to streamline and simplify the taxes management for staking cryptocurrency coins.
dApps.howTo:
How it works:
1.  Enter Wallet address  on the StakeTax  home  page.
2.  View and Download CSV , after waiting 0-5 minutes for job to finish.
3.  Import CSV  into a crypto tax website like Cointracking or Koinly.

dApps.name: Revoke Cash
dApps.description: revoke. cash is an app that allows you to inspect all the contracts you've approved to spend money on your behalf, and revoke their access for the ones you no longer need.
dApps.howTo:
1.  Install the Revoke.cash browser extension.
2. The extension alerts you before signing potentially harmful documents, enhancing your awareness.
3. Safeguard against phishing scams by prompting a second thought before proceeding.

dApps.name: Axelar
dApps.description: Axelar is a network that provides secure cross-chain communication for Web3, enabling you to build Interchain dApps that grow beyond a single chain.

dApps.name: Celer
dApps.description: Celer cBridge is a cross-chain bridge solution that enables seamless and secure token transfers across different blockchain networks including Evmos.

dApps.name: Wormhole
dApps.description: Wormhole is a decentralized protocol that bridges Evmos ecosystem with USDC, USDT, WETH and more tokens.

dApps.name: Gravity Bridge
dApps.description: Gravity Bridge is cosmos blockchain that  bridges Ethereum to Evmos

dApps.name: Tashi
dApps.description: A user-friendly decentralized lending and borrowing platform that aims to simplify the Decentralized Finance (DeFi) user experience. Built on the Evmos ecosystem, Tashi offers a transparent, secure, and easy-to-use platform for anyone interested in decentralized lending and borrowing across multiple blockchains.

dApps.name: Yieldmos
dApps.description: Yieldmos Beta - Non-Custodial Yield Optimizer. With Yieldmos, you can boost yields by auto compounding your staking and LP rewards with validators of your choice.

dApps.name: FlokiFi Locker
dApps.description: FlokiFi Locker is a web3 application that lets users to securely lock their assets for any amount of time, be it one week or ten years.

dApps.name: Forge
dApps.description:
Forge is the largest decentralized exchange in Evmos ecosystem that captures over two thirds of TVL and allows you to liquid stake, bridge your assets or participate in Evmos governance.

Connect your wallet to the app, explore existing liquidity pools, provide liquidity, swap assets, liquid stake and always have a detailed overview of your portfolio in front of you with Forge.
dApps.howTo: Connect your wallet to the app, explore existing liquidity pools, provide liquidity, swap assets, liquid stake and always have a detailed overview of your portfolio in front of you with Forge.

dApps.name: Osmosis
dApps.description: Osmosis is a decentralized exchange in the Cosmos ecosystem and an AMM protocol that allows creation of limitless liquidity pools.

dApps.name: Steer
dApps.description: Multi-chain compute protocol with next-gen automated liquidity management.

dApps.name: Revert
dApps.description: Revert provides analytics, automation, and management tools for liquidity providers in AMM protocols.

dApps.name: SpaceFi
dApps.description: SpaceFi is a cross-chain Web 3.0 platform with DEX, NFT, Starter and DAO on Evmos and zkSync, connecting Cosmos and Layer2.

dApps.name: Stride
dApps.description:
Stride is a Cosmos Zone that provides liquidity for staked tokens, including EVMOS.

Stake with Stride and watch your rewards grow while exploring and participating in various yielding strategies.
Connect your wallet to the  stride app  and stake your EVMOS tokens in exchange for stEVMOS, which you can deploy around the ecosystem and redeem with Stride at any time to receive your original tokens.
dApps.oneLiner: Earn staking rewards while keeping your tokens liquid
dApps.howTo:
Stake with Stride and watch your rewards grow while exploring and participating in various yielding strategies.
Connect your wallet to the  stride app  and stake your EVMOS tokens in exchange for stEVMOS, which you can deploy around the ecosystem and redeem with Stride at any time to receive your original tokens.

dApps.name: StayKing
dApps.description: StayKing is a DeFI protocol that features leveraged staking and lending, working to generate relatively stable and low-risk profits for lenders.

dApps.name: Evmos Staking
dApps.description: Earn rewards for participating in Evmos’ network's security.

dApps.name: Disperze
dApps.description: Disperze is a Proof of Stake validator on the Cosmos ecosystem.

dApps.name: Digifinex
dApps.description: DigiFinex is a global digital asset management platform that offers IEOs, project listings, OTC, and margin trading.

dApps.name: Huobi
dApps.description: Purchase crypto directly on this centralized exchange.

dApps.name: Bitget
dApps.description: The top crypto derivatives and largest copy trading platform.

dApps.name: MEXC
dApps.description: MEXC is known as the exchange of high performance and mega transaction matching technology. The team at MEXC are some of the first movers and pioneers of financial and blockchain technology.

dApps.name: BingX
dApps.description: BingX is a leading crypto exchange that offers spot, derivatives, copy trading, and grid trading services to more than 100 countries and regions worldwide with over 5 million users.

dApps.name: CoinEx
dApps.description: CoinEx is a highly secure, stable and efficient cryptocurrency exchange for global users.
